featured.text: He was still on medication, but not nearly as much as Alfred, who was just in the early stage of his recovery.
Alfred said his goal, of course, was to feel even better than his brother.

“I’m 15 minutes older than him, but now I’m younger because of my heart and I’m not going to respect him,” Alfred said with a grin, pointing to his brother while talking to a roomful of reporters, who laughed frequently at their jokes.
Two days before Valentine’s Day in 2002, Alfred received a 19-year-old heart, marking the first time on record that twin adults each received heart transplants.

other.text: Why did Alfred say, “I’m 15 minutes older than him, but now I’m younger because of my heart” ?
What did Alfred and Anthony have in common? (A) Lifespan.
What did Alfred and Anthony think caused their heart problems? (A) Exercise.

definition.zh_def: 阿爾弗雷德，一個常見的男性名字，源自古英語，意為“精明的顧問”。
definition.en_def: Alfred, a common male given name of Old English origin meaning 'wise counselor'.
definition.example: Alfred is planning to start his own business next year.
